reviews.review: 9/10 the only problem is the main character is mute
Best game ever

Half-Life 2 seems to take every little part of the user's brain and test it throughout Gordon's journey.  Dying feels like a mistake on the part of the player and not because of faulty AI or overmatched opponents. Groundbreaking when it first was released and still incredibly enjoyable to this day.  This is a masterpiece, and the standard by which all other FPS adventures need to be measured.

Десять из десяти, 7 лет игре, а ведь всеравно интересно перпройти ^_^

What on earth happened to this game?

I played all of the original three HLs, Opposing & Blue Shift and replayed them several times in the era before Steam. This... just... seems... dull... I know I'm late to the party (got the game in 2010 or so) but that was also true the first time around; HL came out about '98 and I started playing it in '01

The graphics are great I suppose, but there is just no draw to it. It feels like job. Sigh, 9am, off to save the world I spose...

Can someone explain what the appeal of this is or should be? The first game had esoteric environments, a slowly unravelling plot but mainly the surprise shoot-outs with weirds and unexpected things, that you you got to "asplode" with increasingly hilarious weapons

I haven't finished it. I've done stuff with buggies and boats, yawn.

EDIT: finished it. less than twenty hours, really? You'll have bought this either in the first wave of fervour or as part of a bundle. Give it a go, but I must be one of the rare ones not overly fond...

5/10
Rise and shine, Mr. Freeman. Rise and shine.
Great game! THE game that solidified Valve in this world.

Everyone talks about this game for a reason. If you haven't yet played it, please do so now. It stil holds up as one of the greatest games ever made. it might not end up being your favorite of all time, but I guarantee it will be up there, and you will be hooked.
How can you not like the game starring everyone's favourite warrior scientist?

Um FPS bem elaborado a níveis nunca antes pensados, supera Doom 3 facilmente. Enquanto o rival da ID Software se concentrou em interação com painéis, iluminação, texturização dos modelos e outros detalhes variados dentro de um ambiente fechado, HL2 chega fazendo tudo isso e tudo mais, trazendo a possibilidade de explorar um mundo e não lugares fechados apenas. Também Incorpora varios elementos de outros jogos, como o uso de veículos variados introduzidos ao genero por Battlefield. Campanha envolvente com riquíssimo storyline. Um jogo atemporal, uma jóia do cyberpunk, e indubitavelmente um jogo pra citar entre os melhores que você já jogou.

Half-Life 2 is by far my most favorite FPS game of all time. Solid gameplay with graphics and effects that still hold up to today's standards, coupled with a deceptively deep, immersive, and ever-interesting story, this game has everything a trigger-happy gamer with a soft-spot for a ltitle fluff could ever love. I highly recommend this game! Check it out on the Orange Box and you'll also get Half-Life 2: Episode 1, Episode 2, Portal, and Team Fortress 2.
Another one of the greatest games ever made.

Sem palavras para esse jogo. 
Esta sem dúvidas na minha lista dos melhores games já criados para a vida. 
Além da história ser perfeita e envolvente, você vai querer saber tudo até o último segundo do jogo. Você se apega bastante a vários personagens e na história principalmente, trazendo novas tecnologias para representar a física nos games (até hoje sendo mencionado por isto).
Nem preciso mencionar que vale a pena cada tempo GANHO jogando este DEUS DOS FPSs.

One evening I decided to buy Half-Life 2 after remembering enjoying the first one so much. I was so much blown away that when the sun came up I briefly thought it was setting down, disbieliving I had played straigth through the night without noticing. I spent hundreds of hours playing it and I even listen to its soundtrack continuously. I never had such an experience with any other game.

 To be honest it's hard to be objective since I like this game so much. However for those of you that have never played it but heard all the praise about it, you might be a little disapointed. HL2 like the first of the name is one of those games that raised the bar and inspired many to come in such a way that playing it for the first time years later it feels less original and innovative.

If you haven't played Half-Life 2 yet you really should, with one of the best single player campaigns in a first person shooter ever, it still holds up well today. If you can, grab the Orange Box set, which will give you Half-Life 2, as well as Half-Life 2 Episode One and Two, which continues the epic storyline and you also snag yourself a copy of Portal, if you haven't already got that gem and Team Fortress 2, one of, if not the best class based shooters out there.
amazing
Game sux

2004 was Half Life 2, WoW and Rome Total War, but HL2 was not only my GOTY, but my best game of the 21st century thus far.

Everything is spectacular, the story, the characters, the engine was groundbreaking for its time, overly imaginative, rediculously good level design and variety, immersive world, amazing sound track with tracks playing at perfectly timed moments rather than being a constant forgetable drumming, with little bits of puzzle and horror blended in.

Without a doubt, an absolutely brilliant game, well deserving of every award and accolade it recieved.
If you don't have this already, why? Get it, you'll thank yourself 50 hours later after you finished....

Все началось осенним дождливым вечером 2004 года. Я пришел к своему другу, и с порога получил в руки 2 диска без коробки, на которых красовались «мужик с ломом и баба» и очень знакомое название: Half-Life. Вернувшись домой я установил эту игру, и долго ждал загрузки после которой были дикие тормоза и «заикавшиеся озвучка». Пройдя я забыл про эту игру попутно похерев оба диска, как вдруг, я очень захотел пере пройти эту игру. К тому времени я уже обновил железо на компе, и после долгих поисков нашел заветный диск. И тут все завертелось…
Excellent continuation of the series. Dramatically shorter than the original, but still a lot of fun. I find myself playing the Half-Life series over and over. Love the story.
